name: PrinciplesbyRayDalio
0:
”Alexa, launch Daily Dalio”
”Alexa, ask Daily Dalio for a tip”
”Alexa, ask Daily Dalio for advice”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily dalio
des:
Hear management tips and general advice from Ray Dalio's publicly available list of principles. Dalio is a philanthropist and founder of Bridgewater, one of the largest hedge funds in the world. If you enjoy these and want to learn more Principles I would recommend Dalio's latest book, which can be found at principles.com

If you have feedback on the Alexa Skill you can reach me @nofeliyan on Twitter

P.S. this is not officially affiliated or sponsored by the author! All rights belong to Ray Dalio.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
